_sText:
first, my english is bad :S

there is one t spawn and more than 48 ct spawns
the t pushs a colored button, the ct´s have to go on the platform like the color of the button, after a time all platforms out of the platform with the color of the button are going down, if a ct touch the floor he will die, from time to time a bit of the platforms on wich the ct´s can walk will break and if the cts can stay alive for a while.... see your self ;D
the color of the pushed button will be seen at the big "map by ammok" symbol

hint: you can push the radio to turn the musik on


***HAVE FUN***
